documentation.text:
@title SubscriptionManager
 @dev Contract for managing subscriptions to Pesito a Pesito service

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Only owner can call this function"

arguments.value: Only owner can call this function

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Only owner can call this function"

documentation.text: @dev Modifier to restrict function to contract owner
@dev Purchase a subscription for one month
@dev Check if an address has an active subscription
@dev Get subscription details for an address
